phrase: If you can imagine it you can do it, if you can dream it, you can make it happen
author: William Arthur Ward

phrase: Life is what happens to you around you, don't worry about it, you pass it around you
author: Johnny Depp

phrase: Good luck is what happens when the preparation and opportunity are and fuse
author: Voltaire

phrase: Do not judge every day for what you harvest, but for the seeds that plants.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

phrase: Life is 10 percent what happens to me and 90 percent how I react to it.
author: Charles Swindoll

phrase: My mistakes were seeds.
author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

phrase: It should be laugh without waiting to be happy, lest death surprise us without having laughed.
author: Jean de la Bruyère

phrase: There is no such strong clove that you can stop the wheel of fortune.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

phrase: I have not failed, I have found ten thousand ways that do not work.
author: Thomas Alva Edison

phrase: In life you sometimes earn, sometimes you learn.
author: John Maxwell

phrase: If you focus on the wound you will continue to suffer, if you focus on the lesson, you will continue to grow
author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

phrase: An intelligent man would never irritate himself if he always had a mirror in front and see when he discusses.
author: John Maxwell

phrase: Every morning we are born again.What we do today is what matters most.
author: Budha

phrase: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.Somehow, they already know what you really want to be.Everything else is secondary.
author: Steve Jobs

phrase: There are moments in life that you don't know what to do, more than just take your own path,
author: Paulo Coelho

phrase: Wealth, after all, is something relative, since the one who has little and wants less is richer than he who has more and wants even more.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

phrase: The way to give once on the nail is to give a hundred times in the horseshoe.
author: Coronel Sanders

phrase: A good traveler has neither fixed plans nor the intention of arriving.
author: Lao Tzu

phrase: Uninterrupted happiness bores;You must have alternatives.
author: Molière

phrase: Your trip will be much easier and more light if you do not load the past with you.
author: Anónimo

phrase: When I got up this morning I smiled.I have 24 new hours in front of me.I promise to live every moment.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

phrase: Make your masterpiece every day.
author: John Wooden

phrase: Every step forward is a step to get something bigger and better than your current situation.
author: Brian Tracy

phrase: New day, new thoughts, new hopes and new opportunities.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

phrase: It always gives your best every day.What plants now will be harvested later.
author: Og Mandino

phrase: Pleasure at work leads to the perfection of the work.
author: Aristóteles

phrase: I am not the product of my circumstances.I am the product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

phrase: Uncertainty is always there, dismantling our comfort when we believe it will be eternal.
author: Pancho Antonio Benjumea

phrase: If you never see daylight, the night will become eternal.
author: Marta Gárgoles

phrase: Joy is the main ingredient in the health compound.
author: A. Murphy

phrase: Educating intelligence is to expand the horizon of your desires and your needs.
author: J. R. Lowell

phrase: Sometimes I win and sometimes I learn.I never lose.
author: Javier Romero Naranjo
